title: The Falconeer: Warrior Edition
description: The Falconeer is a 2020 aerial combat video game developed by Tomas Sala and published by Wired Productions. It was released on November 10, 2020 for Windows, Xbox One and as a launch title for Xbox Series X and Series S. It received average reviews upon release. An enhanced version of the game, titled The Falconeer: Warrior Edition is scheduled to release for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch on August 5, 2021.
